review.reviewBody: They r renewing but food is awesome, waiting them to open for dine-in
it was too liquidy with extra salt Dal Makhni
I ordered six Garlic Naans but only 1 and a half naan got delivered
the food was very spicy and inedible
I order two plates and got only one
